messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1674
messages.msgSnippet: Yes.  Katy is just west of us.  There are lots of very conservative Christian homeschoolers there. Mimi
messages.messageBody:
Yes. Katy is just west of us. There are lots of very conservative
Christian homeschoolers there.

Mimi

On Saturday, December 8, 2001, at 04:33 PM, Julie Stauffer wrote:

> <<We live in Houston>>
>
> We lived in Katy for many years. Katy is pretty much
> school-at-homers........perhaps I'm looking behind the wrong trees.....
>
> Julie

We lived in Katy for many years. Katy is pretty much
school-at-homers........perhaps I'm looking behind the wrong trees.....

Julie
